Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.21801309]HCV:inhibition of HCVcc infection in Huh7.5.1 cells(IC50>5.00 μM);HIV-1:inhibition of pseudotyped HIV infection in TZM-BL cells(IC50=3.50±0.36 μM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits HCV and HIV infection in vitro, which can disrupt the integrity of the viral membrane and capsid core while preserving the integrity of host membranes.

Literature.Title: Rational design of peptides with anti-HCV/HIV activities and enhanced specificity.
Literature.Author: Li GR, He LY, Liu XY, Liu AP, Huang YB, Qiu C, Zhang XY, Xu JQ, Yang W, Chen YX.
